mapper.select: SELECT id , intro, type, m.selected as selected, m.correct as correct FROM party_question LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT d.question_id, t.selected AS selected, 1 - d.wrong/t.selected AS correct FROM ( SELECT question_id, COUNT(*) AS selected FROM party_answer GROUP BY question_id ) AS t, ( SELECT question_id, COUNT(*) AS wrong FROM party_answer WHERE score = 0 GROUP BY question_id ) AS d WHERE t.question_id = d.question_id ) AS m ON m.question_id = party_question.id order by selected DESC LIMIT #{currentPage} ,#{pageSize}
SELECT count(*) as total from party_question
